# Africa's Elephant Kingdom

| runtime = 40 minutes
| country = United States
| language = English
| budget =
| gross =
}}
'Africa's Elephant Kingdom' is a 1998 IMAX film documenting life under the lives of African bush elephants. The film was produced by the Discovery Channel under Discovery Pictures. The film is set in Tanzania and Kenya, and is narrated by an elephant named "Old Bull" (voiced by Avery Brooks). The film was directed by Michael Caulfield.
